name: Infiltrator: Security Systems Demo
description:
This is a pre alpha / proof of concept / this game sucks help me improve it - thing. The whole game is based on interactions with security systems, like cameras, turrets, lasers and alarms. The full game will come out in a few months and will feature better maps and deeper more interactive gameplay.

It will also feature a story, based on realistic predictions about our world. Our world is heading on to a future where automation will leave the vast majority of people, not only unemployable but useless. Our society simply won't need billions of people to function. The rich don't outright kill the poor. Instead with taxes and laws make it difficult for them to breed, so with enough time, the world population will come down to sustainable levels.

On the first level, you need to Right click with the Green Cube in the last room. On all other levels you just need to get to the exit.

Controls : WASD to move. Left click to interact with Alarms and Buttons.
